caption:
(b) Effectiveness of the AR Prior Model in LARP
(c) Comparison Across AR Generative Models
description: The chart displays the effectiveness of the autoregressive prior model in LARP and compares its performance against other AR generative models in terms of reconstruction and generation FVD.

caption: Figure 3: Scaling LARP tokenizer size and number of tokens.
description: The chart displays the reconstruction FVD (rFVD) and generation FVD (gFVD) for three different sizes of the LARP tokenizer (LARP-S, LARP-B, LARP-L) and varying numbers of discrete tokens.

caption: Figure 3: Scaling LARP tokenizer size and number of tokens.
description: The chart displays the impact of scaling the LARP tokenizer size and the number of discrete tokens on reconstruction and generation FVD.
